mapper.select:
select
from bas_shipment_rules
del_flag=1
and FIND_IN_SET(#{customCode},custom_code)
and product_code =#{productCode}

select
from bas_shipment_rules where del_flag=1 and type_name=1
and custom_code =#{customCode}
and FIND_IN_SET(#{serviceChannelName},service_channel_sub)
